## HoloHashMap.forEach() method

Executes a callback function for each entry in the map.

**Signature:**

```typescript
forEach(callbackfn: (value: V, key: K, map: Map<K, V>) => void, thisArg?: any): void;
```

</th><th>

callbackfn


</td><td>

(value: V, key: K, map: Map&lt;K, V&gt;) =&gt; void


</td><td>

Function to execute for each entry


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

thisArg


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional value to use as 'this' when executing the callback


</td></tr>

void
